column2: Standard AVB Financial Corp. operates as a holding company. The company is headquartered in Monroeville, Pennsylvania and currently employs 158 full-time employees. The Bank is a Pennsylvania-chartered state savings bank. The company is a retail-oriented financial institution, which offers deposit and loan products. The company has approximately nine offices located in Allegheny, Westmoreland and Bedford Counties of Pennsylvania and Northern Allegany County of Maryland. The company offers personal banking services, such as personal checking and savings accounts, mobile banking, online banking, certificate of deposits and individual retirement accounts (IRAs). The company offers business banking services, such as business checking and savings accounts, business online banking, business services and business loans. The company also offers wealth management services. The Company, through its subsidiary, Westmoreland Investment Company, is engaged in holding residential mortgage loans. The company offers a range of loan products, such as real estate loans, and other loans.
